messages.title: Don't let this man get away with yet more cuts...
messages.content: The Tories have rejected a plea from doctors' leaders to... guarantee the NHS an extra £8 billion a year by 2020.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In many parts of the country, only a Lib Dem vote can beat the Tories
